about_the_game:
Embark on a heart-pounding journey as you step into the shoes of a courageous agent tasked with infiltrating Test Labs. Within these sinister walls, failed experiments on COVID patients have unleashed a terrifying aftermath – the birth of mutated creatures lurking in the shadows.


Your mission is clear: navigate dangerous corridors, strategically plant explosive charges at critical areas, and obtain valuable sample evidence that could shed light on this catastrophic ordeal. But that's not all; you must also become a beacon of hope for survivors trapped within this labyrinth, rescuing them from this living nightmares.


Prepare to face the unknown, for each mission will test your skills and resilience to the limit. As you delve deeper into the Test Labs, prepare to square off against abominations of unimaginable strength. Arm yourself with an arsenal of diverse weapons, each carefully crafted to counter the grotesque entities that stand in your way.


"Covid-23: Test Labs" immerses players in a high-stakes battle for survival, where quick reflexes, strategic thinking, and a brave spirit will be your greatest allies.

Are you ready to face the horrors within, conquer the unknown, and reclaim humanity from the clutches of despair? The fate of countless lives rests in your hands. The time to act is now. Join the fight against the unforeseen and shape the future.

content_descriptors.notes: Exploding bodies into pieces are shown. Internal elements like bones, ribcage, full head and whatnot can be seen.

Your mission is clear: navigate dangerous corridors, strategically plant explosive charges at critical areas, and obtain valuable sample evidence that could shed light on this catastrophic ordeal. name: COVID 23 : Test Labs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win-8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card (e.g., Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: Keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Win-8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (e.g., Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: Keyboard and mouse

short_description: Infiltrate hazardous facilities, plant explosives, gather vital evidence, and save survivors while battling against nightmarish mutations. Brace yourself for an intense and action-packed mission to overcome the unexpected horrors that await.
